Values.CosmosDbConnectionString: <connection string for Cosmos DB local emulator or development Cosmos DB instance>
Values.ServiceBusConnectionString: <connection string for Service Bus used for comment moderation>
Values.ContentModerationQueueName: <the name of the specific queue in the Service Bus used for comment moderation>
Values.ContentModeratorSubscriptionKey: <the subscription key for Azure Cognitive Services content moderator>
Values.ContentModeratorEndpoint: <the Azure Cognitive Services content moderator endpoint url>
